item.title: Children do not say the lion's name at night
item.summary: The children call the lion different names by day and by night and wish to avoid insulting (or slighting it).
item.comments: 1) See also The lion has the power of turning itself into other things and A wild cat, when many have been killed by a person changes itself into a lion and kills the slayer, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-23
